text: Bay Minette is a city in Baldwin County, Alabama, United States. According to the 2020 census, its population was 8,107. The city is the county seat of Baldwin County. ==Geography== Bay Minette is located at (30.883446, -87.777183). According to the U.S. Census Bureau, the city has a total area of . (0.50%) is water. ==Notable residents== * Todd Grisham, sports announcer for World Wrestling Entertainment and Fox Soccer Channel * Joe M. Rodgers, United States Ambassador to France * Scotty Joe Weaver, hate crime victim featured in the documentary Small Town Gay Bar * Wallace Gilberry, Defensive End for the 2Kansas City Chiefs * William Conrad Burford, RebelX == References == Category:Cities in Alabama Category:County seats in Alabama
title: Bay Minette, Alabama
